property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Noble.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character leaves play, ready Prince Imrahil. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a hero.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attached hero gains +1 Ò.
Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Quest to another hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Move any number of resource tokens from a Ì hero's resource pool to any other hero's resource pool.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Eagle.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Landroval cannot have restricted attachments.
Response: After a hero card is destroyed, return Landroval to his owner's hand to put that hero back into play, with 1 damage token on it. (Limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an ally is destroyed, exhaust 1 Eagle character to move that ally from the discard pile to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
While committed to a quest, Escort from Edoras gets +2 Ò.
Forced: After resolving a quest to which Escort from Edoras was committed, discard Escort from Edoras from play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After attached location is explored, the first player draws 3 cards.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Ranged. Sentinel.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Move any number of damage from one enemy to another.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Radagast collects 1 resource each resource phase. These resources can be used to pay for Creature cards played from your hand.
Action: Spend X resources from Radagast's pool to heal X wounds on any 1 Creature.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Rhosgobel and Wilyador, and add them to the staging area with 2 damage tokens on Wilyador. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel

property.name: Text
property.value:
Response: After the quest phase begins, the first player may place X damage tokens on Wilyador to look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Reveal and add 1 of these cards to the staging area, and discard the other 2. X is the number of players in the game.
Forced: After a card effect heals Wilyador, remove that card from the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Revealed: Heal 5 wounds from Wilyador for each Athelas objective card the players control.
If Wilyador is completely healed when this effect resolves, Wilyador survives and the players have won the game. Otherwise, the players have lost the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective if it has no encounters attached. Then, attach Athelas to that hero.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Eagle.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments. The first player gains control of Wilyador, as an ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the end of each round, Wilyador suffers 2 damage. Wilyador cannot be healed of more than 5 wounds by a single effect. If Wilyador leaves play, the players have lost the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel

property.name: Keywords
property.value: X is the number of players in the game.

property.name: Text
property.value:
While Rhosgobel is in the staging area, Wilyador cannot be healed.
Travel: Players must complete stage one of this quest before they can travel to Rhosgobel.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After the players explore Forest Grove, search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 Athelas objective, and add it to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each exhausted character.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each character without any attachments.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If a character (including Wilyador) has more damage than each other character, deal 3 additional damage to that character.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each wounded character.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to each wounded character. (2 damage instead if this attack is undefended.)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel

property.name: Text
property.value: Only Eagle characters or characters with ranged can attack or defend against Mirkwood Flock.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, the damage must be placed on Wilyador.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel

property.name: Text
property.value: Only Eagle characters or characters with ranged can attack or defend against Black Forest Bats.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, the damage must be placed on Wilyador.
